Reverse complement a DNA sequence

Source: R/reverse_complement.R
reverse_complement.Rd

Converts a DNA sequence to its reverse complement using the mapping A <-> T and C <-> G.

Usage

reverse_complement(seq)

Arguments

seq

A character string representing a DNA sequence composed of A, C, G, and T.

Value

A character string containing the reverse complement of seq.

Examples

reverse_complement("ACGT")
#> [1] "ACGT"
reverse_complement("GATTACA")
#> [1] "TGTAATC"
